Title: Man United confirms Casemiro set to leave at end of season
Summary: Manchester United confirm that midfielder Casemiro will leave the club at the end of his contract this summer . Man United confirm the midfielder is set to leave at end of the season . The Portuguese midfielder has been linked with a move to Arsenal .

Title: ‘Wizkid is my friend’ – Yeni Kuti reacts amid ongoing feud
Summary: Yeni Kuti reacts to ongoing online feud between her brother, Seun and Wizkid . The eldest daughter of late Afrobeat legend Fela Anikulapo Kuti has reacted to the ongoing feud .

Title: Nigerian shippers reject port fees hike, fear inflation
Summary: The National Shippers Association of Nigeria (NSAN) has rejected the recent increase of port service charges . NSAN warned that the move could raise trade costs and aggravate inflation .

Title: Tinubu’s second term an existential threat to Nigeria – Ogbonnia
Summary: Dr. SKC Ogbonnia, former APC presidential aspirant and stalwart of the African Democratic Congress (ADC), has described President Bola Tinubu as an existential threat to Nigeria . He said that he should not be allowed a second term in office .

Title: Tinubu approves oil drilling at Tongeji Island – Abiodun
Summary: Tinubu approves commercial oil drilling at Tongeji Island in Ipokia Local Government Area of Ogun state . The president has approved the commencement of commercial drilling at the island .

Title: Wike drags striking FCTA workers to court
Summary: Nyesom Wike has taken the Joint Unions Action Committee of the Federal Capital Territory Administration to court over the ongoing strike by FCTA workers . The lawsuit was filed at the Abuja Division of the National Industrial Court of Nigeria . The court ordered that service be effected through publication in the Leadership Newspaper or any other national daily,

Title: Tinubu approves commercial oil drilling in Ogun
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has approved the commencement of commercial oil drilling at Tongeji Island in Ipokia Local Government Area of Ogun State . Governor Dapo Abiodun also revealed that the President had approved the immediate take-off of the Olokola Deep Seaport project located in Ogun Waterside Local Government

Title: Two die of Lassa fever in Benue
Summary: The Benue State Commissioner for Health and Human Services, Dr Paul Ogwuche, has disclosed that two people have died from Lassa fever in the state . The commissioner had earlier, on Sunday, alerted residents to an outbreak of the disease, stating that seven persons had been infected . Two additional suspected cases were recently recorded on

Title: Rivers unveils innovation hub to empower youths, curb unemployment
Summary: The facility, located in Fimie in the Port Harcourt City Local Government Area, has been described as a bold investment in the state’s future . The initiative is a collaborative effort involving the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention in Nigeria, via the Institute of Human Virology Nigeria, with implementation support from Project Hope

Title: Mutfwang condemns terror attacks in Plateau communities
Summary: Governor of Plateau State, Caleb Mutfwang, has expressed deep sorrow over the brutal attack by suspected terrorists on a mining camp in Kuru District of Jos South Local Government Area, which claimed several innocent lives . The governor made the statement on Thursday following the killing of seven people by gunmen who attacked a mining site in the Kuru
